articles.description: Nag Ashwin’s Kalki 2898 AD has been accused by digital artiste Sung Choi of stealing his artwork. He has also shared proof. | Bollywood
articles.content: The virtual world has been abuzz about the streaks of similarities between Nag Ashwins created dystopian world of Kalki 2898 AD with Hollywood biggies such as Dune and Mad Max: Fury Road. Now, the ma… [+3082 chars]

articles.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan performs Charkrasana: Here's how it can tone your abs | Health | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
